column17:
This appealing formal shirt comes from Provogue. In the colour pink with a solid pattern the shirt features full sleeves button down placket a chest pocket along with brand logo applique. The polyester fabric gives it a fine finishing and makes it a must have in your formal collection.

Features
  • Fabric: Polyester blend
  • Colour: Pink
  • Sleeves: Full sleeves
  • Pattern: Solid
  • Front: Full buttoned placket
  • Pockets: One chest pocket
  • Fit: Regular
  • Collar: Button down collar

Style it up with a pair of beige trousers and formal shoes for a complete look.

Care Tips
Wash with like colours
Do not soak tumble dry or bleach
Mild iron
Line dry
